channel.title: How do compile for someone else?
channel.description:
Ok heres the deal i made a server and my friend hosts it...how do i set it up so i can compile it and it effects the hosts files and it shows the new character files etc
I know its possible because im a coder for this guys server and i can compile it and it effects his files...
Please help me, You can post on here or contact me at es_sk8ter11@hotmail.com

item.title: How do compile for someone else?
item.dc:creator: @_Raith †Raith†
item.description:
@_Raith wrote:

thats not what im talking about im saying i want to compile on my computer and it affect his but i dont wanna keep sending back and forth…also so like it edits my character file and i see logs etc…ive done it on downunder.no-ip.org but the hoster wont tell me how to do it with someone else
[br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2007, 09:25:10 PM[/size][hr]ok guys i really need a TuT idk if its allowed but ill pay 700k real rs cash[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 02:23:47 PM[/size][hr]ok triple post but i got scammed 4 points for jordan7
